attributes.action: Stop Outsourcing/Offshoring and protect UK employees - Take the Big Step
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most of the UK companies are now doing outsourcing/offshoring, and this is having a negative impact on the struggling economy. 

Should the Gov. put a CAP on outsourcing/offshoring or some other solution which forces companies to go for UK base employees and not become greedy like bankers and think only about themselves and their shareholders. Also, to avoid possible unemployment damage in the near future as this will only create a burden on the government to pay salary to the unemployed.
